resources.string: Available in the PRO and PREMIUM versions
Please take a minute to learn what this app contains :)
PRO features + advanced control, widgets and more…
Multiple OctoPrint profiles, streaming, custom commands, 2D & 3D visualizers, real-time simulator & more…
Basic pack of features for free & for an unlimited duration
Control Printoid with a keyboard or build your own physical interface by using ADB!
More informations about the available commands on the official web-site
The LITE version is free for an unlimited duration, but contains advertising.
To remove the ads, enjoy the full-featured app, and support the developer, you can purchase Printoid PRO or Printoid PREMIUM.
Monitor your 3D printers without having to start the application!
Add as many widget as you want to build your own interface and just tap on them to update the values!
Always keep an eye on what\'s happening on your 3D printer plate!
In-app video player, launcher widget and floating icon to see your video from anywhere
A reverse proxy on the Raspberry Pi is a good practice to make the streaming accessible on the same port as OctoPrint
Customize Printoid with your own commands & features!
Create your own buttons to send GCODE commands to your 3D printer
Communicate with your Raspberry Pi over SSH (control a relay…)
Access to your OctoPrint built-in commands (registered in config.yaml)
Control and manage as many OctoPrint servers and 3D printers as you need!
Printoid will smartly use by itself the local (LAN) or distant (WAN) configuration when needed
Please note that every Printoid settings are relative to the selected profile
The 2D and 3D visualizers are accessible from the extended file manager (open it from the left menu)
Check each layers of your GCODE files in 2D or visualize the whole STL or GCODE object in 3D from the app!
Printoid also provides a real-time 2D simulator when you are printing an object
Control and manage your 3D printer directly from your wrist!
Printer informations, axis control, temperatures/ventilation/extruders management, files and commands lists
This module is only available for Android Wear (not available for Samsung Wear (Tizen))
You also have an extra access to your OctoPrint server web interface, without having to leave Printoid!
Designed to fit perfectly with smartphone and tablet screens
You will be able to find all the responses to your questions on https://printoid.net
Constant updates, tricks & tips, useful informations, development communication…
Feel free to contact the developer by e-mail for any issue or feature request!

Printoid is able to restore the whole configuration from a previous installation if needed (if you had installed Printoid LITE for example).\n\nTo achieve this, please accept the permission in the following dialog.
Can\'t apply the backup from Printoid %s, an error occurred
Can\'t apply the backup from Printoid %s, its \'write external storage\' permission is not granted
Can\'t apply the backup from Printoid %s, an unknown error occurred
